name: Bowl Story
description:
Master the skills of Boule on this island you find yourself in. Challenge your friends or play through the story to discover the secrets of this mysterious yet happy island.

Have you got what it takes to become the best there is in Boule?

Take on several characters while exploring the island learning their story while also playing Boule with them. 

If you like my game, please consider donating 😋

I have developed this project as a part of my major project for my Master's course and I have worked really hard to get it where it is. This has been my life for the last five months so please consider donating 🙏🏽

Please note - this project is still under development and so you might face some bugs. Please feel free to provide any feedback at akshay1427@gmail.com. 

Known issues - 

Unable to save story mode progress at the moment but will be implemented very soon.
